biotools.summary: Tool designed to reduce the complexity of very large sets of data by decomposing it into so-called “modules”. In the context of gene expression data these modules consist of subsets of genes that exhibit a coherent expression profile only over a subset of microarray experiments.

bioschemas.name: ISA
bioschemas.summary: Tool designed to reduce the complexity of very large sets of data by decomposing it into so-called “modules”. In the context of gene expression data these modules consist of subsets of genes that exhibit a coherent expression profile only over a subset of microarray experiments.
